attributes.action: allow the consumption of alcohol within the confines of a university setting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ASS - Alcohol for Students in Seminars or SALE - Students for Alcohol in Lectures and Education. Specifically wish for alcohol to be allowed to be brought within the confines of an adult education facility - specifically university in order to create a relaxed atmosphere and to aid students in learning and development amongst their peers.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
